name: Aave
description: A decentralized lending platform enabling users to earn interest or borrow assets with flexible rates.

apy.explanation: The 6.5% APY is your yearly earnings from lending assets on Aave. It’s based on interest rates paid by borrowers, which adjust with supply and demand across supported chains.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; extensively audited and battle-tested, though integrations add minor complexity.

impermanentLoss.description: Minimal risk; Aave focuses on lending, not AMM pools, so IL is not a concern.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; volatile markets can affect collateral values and borrowing stability.

liquidationRisk.description: Moderate risk; borrowers face liquidation if collateral drops, mitigated by over-collateralization.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Low risk; AAVE’s governance and staking model is robust, with minor centralization concerns.

name: Yearn Finance
description: Automates yield farming by maximizing returns through optimized vaults across DeFi.

apy.explanation: The 8.7% APY is your yearly profit from Yearn vaults. It’s earned by automatically moving your funds to the best yield opportunities in DeFi.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; complex strategies are audited, but past exploits highlight ongoing vigilance needs.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; some vaults use AMMs, exposing users to IL depending on strategy.

marketRisk.description: High risk; vault returns depend heavily on volatile DeFi markets.

liquidationRisk.description: Low risk; Yearn avoids direct lending, reducing liquidation exposure.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; YFI’s limited supply and governance concentration pose stability questions.

name: Curve Finance
description: A DEX designed for efficient stablecoin trading and yield generation.

apy.explanation: The 4.2% APY is your yearly return from providing liquidity to Curve pools. It’s made up of trading fees and CRV rewards, boosted by locking tokens for voting power.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; heavily audited and stable, though past issues require ongoing caution.

impermanentLoss.description: Low risk; stablecoin focus minimizes IL, except in rare pool imbalances.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; stablecoin depegging can disrupt pool stability.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; Curve doesn’t involve lending, so liquidation isn’t a factor.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; veCRV locking may limit liquidity and participation.

name: Uniswap
description: A leading AMM-based DEX providing yield via liquidity pools.

apy.explanation: The 4.8% APY is your yearly earnings from providing liquidity on Uniswap. It comes from trading fees collected when people swap tokens in your pool.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; widely used and audited, with minor risks from complex features.

impermanentLoss.description: High risk; volatile pools can lead to significant IL for liquidity providers.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; pool balances are sensitive to asset price swings.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; Uniswap doesn’t involve lending or liquidation.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Low risk; UNI governance is decentralized, though fee debates persist.

name: SushiSwap
description: A Uniswap fork expanding into yield farming and staking ecosystems.

apy.explanation: The 7.0% APY is your yearly return from SushiSwap liquidity pools. It’s earned from trading fees and SUSHI rewards for staking your funds.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; audited but past exploits and added features increase complexity.

impermanentLoss.description: High risk; volatile pools expose LPs to significant IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; asset volatility affects pool stability.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; no lending means no liquidation risk.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; SUSHI emissions and governance centralization pose challenges.

name: PancakeSwap
description: Top BSC DEX offering yield through farming and staking pools.

apy.explanation: The 10.5% APY is your yearly profit from PancakeSwap pools. It’s earned from trading fees and CAKE rewards when you stake your liquidity.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; well-audited, though BSC centralization adds slight vulnerability.

impermanentLoss.description: High risk; volatile pools can lead to significant IL for LPs.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; BSC ecosystem volatility impacts stability.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; no lending, so no liquidation concerns.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; CAKE inflation and Binance reliance raise concerns.

name: Balancer
description: A customizable AMM for creating liquidity pools and earning yield.

apy.explanation: The 6.2% APY is your yearly return from Balancer pools. It’s based on trading fees and BAL rewards for providing liquidity.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; robust audits and upgrades reduce vulnerabilities.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; customizable pools can increase IL in volatile markets.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; asset price swings affect pool balances.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; no lending means no liquidation risk.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Low risk; veBAL encourages commitment, though governance centralization is a concern.

name: Pendle
description: Tokenizes yield, allowing trading of principal and yield components.

apy.explanation: The 15.2% APY is your yearly profit from staking with Pendle. It’s earned by locking tokens to get PENDLE rewards and trading future yield.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; innovative design is audited but complex.

impermanentLoss.description: Low risk; yield tokenization avoids traditional AMM IL.

marketRisk.description: High risk; yield trading is sensitive to market and rate changes.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; PENDLE rewards and governance may face scalability issues.

name: Convex Finance
description: Boosts Curve Finance yields for liquidity providers.

apy.explanation: The 7.8% APY is your yearly return from staking with Convex. It’s earned by boosting Curve rewards with locked CRV and adding CVX tokens.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; tightly integrated with Curve and well-audited.

impermanentLoss.description: Low risk; relies on Curve’s stablecoin pools with minimal IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; tied to Curve’s ecosystem stability.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; veCVX locking may limit liquidity.

name: Aura Finance
description: Enhances Balancer yields with staking and governance features.

apy.explanation: The 7.3% APY is your yearly earnings from staking with Aura. It comes from rewards in BAL and AURA tokens, plus trading fees from Balancer pools.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; newer protocol with audits, but Balancer dependency adds complexity.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; tied to Balancer pools with variable IL exposure.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; dependent on Balancer ecosystem stability.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; AURA’s reliance on veBAL may limit adoption.

name: Lido Finance
description: Liquid staking for assets like ETH and SOL with yield opportunities.

apy.explanation: The 4.9% APY is your yearly return from staking ETH or SOL with Lido. It’s based on staking rewards from the blockchain, shared with all stakers.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; widely audited and used, though centralization risks exist.

impermanentLoss.description: Minimal risk; staking avoids AMM-related IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; staking rewards depend on network conditions.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; no lending or liquidation involved.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; LDO governance concentration could impact stability.

name: MakerDAO
description: Decentralized lending platform minting DAI with yield from stability fees.

apy.explanation: The 2.9% APY is your yearly earnings from lending on MakerDAO. It comes from stability fees paid by borrowers to keep DAI stable.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; mature protocol with extensive audits.

impermanentLoss.description: Minimal risk; lending focus avoids IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; collateral volatility affects DAI stability.

liquidationRisk.description: Moderate risk; borrowers face liquidation if collateral falls.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Low risk; MKR’s burn mechanism supports stability.

name: Alpaca Finance
description: Leveraged yield farming on BSC and other networks.

apy.explanation: The 18.0% APY is your yearly profit from leveraged farming on Alpaca. It’s earned from boosted yields on staked assets plus ALPACA rewards.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; audited but leverage adds complexity.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; farming pools may face IL with volatility.

marketRisk.description: High risk; leverage amplifies market volatility effects.

liquidationRisk.description: High risk; leveraged positions can be liquidated in downturns.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; ALPACA rewards may lead to inflation.

name: Beefy Finance
description: A multi-chain yield optimizer enhancing returns across various DeFi protocols.

apy.explanation: The 8.9% APY is your yearly earnings from Beefy vaults. It’s earned by optimizing your funds across DeFi platforms for the best returns.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; audited but multi-chain complexity increases exposure.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; some vaults use AMMs with IL potential.

marketRisk.description: High risk; returns depend on volatile DeFi markets.

liquidationRisk.description: Low risk; no direct lending reduces liquidation risk.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; BIFI’s governance and rewards may face scalability issues.

name: Frax Finance
description: A fractional-algorithmic stablecoin protocol with yield-bearing products.

apy.explanation: The 5.3% APY is your yearly return from staking with Frax. It’s earned from stability fees and FXS rewards tied to the FRAX stablecoin.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; audited but algorithmic stability adds complexity.

impermanentLoss.description: Low risk; stablecoin focus minimizes IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; FRAX stability depends on market conditions.

liquidationRisk.description: Moderate risk; collateralized positions may face liquidation.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; FXS governance and peg mechanics pose challenges.

name: Harvest Finance
description: An automated yield farming protocol maximizing returns for users.

apy.explanation: The 10.0% APY is your yearly profit from Harvest vaults. It’s earned by auto-compounding your funds into high-yield DeFi opportunities.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; audited but past exploits raise concerns.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; some strategies involve IL-prone pools.

marketRisk.description: High risk; returns tied to volatile DeFi markets.

liquidationRisk.description: Low risk; no lending reduces liquidation exposure.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; FARM rewards may lead to inflation.

name: Stake DAO
description: A platform for staking and yield strategies with governance features.

apy.explanation: The 7.1% APY is your yearly return from staking with Stake DAO. It’s earned from rewards across various DeFi protocols plus SDT tokens.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; audited but multi-protocol reliance adds complexity.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; some strategies expose users to IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; tied to underlying DeFi market performance.

liquidationRisk.description: Low risk; no direct lending reduces liquidation risk.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; SDT governance and rewards may face adoption hurdles.

name: EigenLayer
description: A restaking protocol enhancing Ethereum security and yield opportunities.

apy.explanation: The 5.0% APY is your yearly return from restaking with EigenLayer. It’s earned by reusing staked ETH to secure additional networks and getting rewards.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; newer protocol with audits, but restaking complexity adds exposure.

impermanentLoss.description: Minimal risk; restaking avoids AMM-related IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; rewards depend on Ethereum and network stability.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; EIGEN’s early governance may face centralization risks.

name: Jito
description: A Solana-based staking and MEV optimization protocol offering yield.

apy.explanation: The 7.8% APY is your yearly return from staking with Jito. It’s earned from Solana staking rewards plus extra profits from optimizing transactions.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; audited but Solana dependency adds some exposure.

impermanentLoss.description: Minimal risk; staking focus avoids IL.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; tied to Solana’s market performance.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; JTO governance and MEV reliance may pose challenges.
